DOC.brief_summary: Investigators wish evaluate effect add VTF upper limb prostheses functional outcome measure upper limb prosthetic user .
DOC.brief_title: Functional Outcome Measures With Vibrotactile Feedback Prostheses
DOC.detailed_description: Investigators perform three experiment : 1 . Investigators add vibrotactile feedback prosthetic user execution standardize functional test performance simple grasp task , disruption normal visual feedback , examine whether performance arm kinematics improve tactile feedback ; 2 . Investigators examine effect add feedback prosthesis performance visual attention dual task assignment prosthetic user , 3 . Investigators provide prosthetic user feedback , use natural surroundings week , study report activity satisfaction level .
DOC.criteria: Unilateral transradial amputee Using transradial myoelectric prosthesis Ability follow simple instruction , understand sign inform consent form Normal correct eyesight Elbow wrist disarticulation partial hand amputation Neuropathy skin ulcer amputate limb
